testsuite.name: Feature: Automation practice application smoke test automation scripts

testcase.classname: Scenario: verify the login functionality of the automation practise site

testcase.name: Given User should be in home page

testcase.name: Given user should verify the the description
And the user should click on the proceed to check out
And the user should check the checkox of the terms of services

When user should click on the address checkbox
Then user should verify the billing address and delivery address

When user should click the pay by bank wire
